title: Because you brought me back
body: I'm sorry for the riot. It's unfair to have you banned me (the chat) and I'm true that I was angry and wrote things I did not have to write but they started offending my family I replied to them I know I'm wrong but it's unfair I did not do anything ... thank you

replies.body:
Hi dude, this is the forum italiano. We know you are very incazzato but honestly nun ce ne frega nothing.

Best saluti, 
Francesco aka ILouD

* This is the italian forum. Your complain might be better suited for the international EUW one.
* If you just suffered a chat restriction, it happened because of what you said regardless of the motive.
* Remember: muting the offenders is always an option, and as such you should take advantage of it.
* Bans are rarely reverted, expecially automated one like the chat restrictions often are.
* You can only work on your toxicity, not on that of the community. You "DID" something, as you ammitted. The reason, in this case, is irrelevant: if they were in the wrong, then they shall be punished too with or without your angry outbursts.
Are you trying to export Ahri's hatred?

> [{quoted}](name=NicFaser,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=ArT4uYzX,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-05-05T14:44:01.399+0000)
>
> Are you trying to export Ahri's hatred?

http://gph.is/1b2opw9
